alert.note: Alert for South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN ITASCA COUNTY THROUGH 545 AM CDT... At 530 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gunn, or near Grand Rapids, moving east-southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Itasca County, including the following locations... Blackberry, Bovey and La Prairie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
